Html:
Hi everyone! Two questions.

1) Is there possibility to change buttons needed for rectangle zoom without poking into source code?
Something similar to -> GmapCtrl.DragButton = MouseButtons.Left;
https://greatmaps.codeplex.com/discussions/233376 similar question asked

2) How can I remove Rectangle after I zoom?
It is removed only when I click right mouse button or middle mouse button.
